front.title: Use of Status-Server Packets in the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Protocol
front.abstract: This document describes a deployed extension to the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) protocol, enabling clients to query the status of a RADIUS server. This extension utilizes the Status-Server (12) Code, which was reserved for experimental use in RFC 2865. This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
